meanings.definition: The quality or state of being impossible to describe.
meanings.sent1: The indescribableness of the sunset left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: Her indescribableness in the dance performance moved the audience.
meanings.sent3: The indescribableness of his magic trick made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The indescribableness of her beauty was like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The indescribableness of the mountain view took our breath away.

meanings.definition: The inability to be adequately expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The indescribableness of his emotions overwhelmed him.
meanings.sent2: The indescribableness of the situation made it hard to explain.
meanings.sent3: The indescribableness of the joke made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The indescribableness of the music filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The indescribableness of the mystery kept us guessing all night.
